getStableCoin(string).details: Retrieves the address of the stablecoin associated with the given name.

returns._0: The address of the stablecoin contract.

getStableCoinName(address).details: Retrieves the name of the stablecoin associated with the given address.

params.stableCoin: The address of the stablecoin contract.
